props.name: variant
props.description: `inset` children are offset (vertically and/or horizontally) from list edges. `full` children are flush (vertically and horizontally) with list edges

props.name: selectionVariant
props.description: Whether multiple items or a single item can be selected.

props.name: showDividers
props.description: Display a divider above each `Item` in this `List` when it does not follow a `Header` or `Divider`.

props.name: role
props.description: ARIA role describing the function of the list. `listbox` and `menu` are a common values.

props.name: children
props.description: Primary content for an Item

props.name: variant
props.description: `danger` indicates that the item is destructive.

props.name: size
props.description: The block size of the ActionList items.

props.name: onSelect
props.description: Callback that is called when the item is selected using either the mouse or keyboard. `event.preventDefault()` will prevent a menu from closing when within an `<ActionMenu />`. This is not called for disabled or inactive items.

props.name: selected
props.description: Indicate whether the item is selected. Only applies to items that can be selected.

props.name: active
props.description: Indicate whether the item is active. There should never be more than one active item.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Items that are disabled can not be clicked, selected, or navigated to.

props.name: inactiveText
props.description:
Text describing why the item is inactive. This may be used when an item's usual functionality is unavailable due to a system error such as a database outage.
If there is a leading visual, the alert icon will replace the leading visual.
If there is a trailing visual, it will replace the trailing visual.
If there is no visual passed, it will be shown in the trailing visual slot to preserve left alignment of item content.
Text will appear in a tooltip triggered by the alert icon in ActionList items, but text will appear below the description or title on ActionMenu items.

props.name: loading
props.description: Whether the item is loading.

props.name: role
props.description: ARIA role describing the function of the item. `option` is a common value.

props.name: id
props.description: id to attach to the root element of the Item

props.name: href
props.description: URL to navigate to when the item is clicked. When provided, the item will render as a link.

props.name: as
props.description: The underlying element to render.

props.name: to
props.description: Destination for React Router or other client-side routing libraries. When provided, the item will render as a link.

props.name: children
props.description: Use to give a heading to list

props.name: as
props.description: The level of the heading

props.name: active
props.description: Indicate whether the item is active. There should never be more than one active item.

props.name: inactiveText
props.description:
Text describing why the item is inactive. This may be used when an item's usual functionality
is unavailable due to a system error such as a database outage.

props.name: children
props.description: Icon (or similar) positioned before item text.

props.name: children
props.description: Visual positioned after item text.

props.name: as
props.description: HTML element to render as.

props.name: label
props.description: Accessible name for the control.

props.name: icon
props.description: Octicon to pass into IconButton. When this is not set, TrailingAction renders as a `Button` instead of an `IconButton`.

props.name: href
props.description: href when the TrailingAction is rendered as a link.

props.name: loading
props.description: Whether the TrailingAction is in a loading state. When true, the TrailingAction will render a spinner instead of an icon. Only available when `as` is 'button'.

props.name: variant
props.description: `inline` descriptions are positioned beside primary text. `block` descriptions are positioned below primary text.

props.name: className
props.description: CSS string

props.name: truncate
props.description: Whether the inline description should truncate the text on overflow.

props.name: children
props.description: Use to give a heading to the groups

props.name: variant
props.description: `filled` style has a background color and top and bottom borders. Subtle style has no background or borders.

props.name: auxiliaryText
props.description: Secondary text which provides additional information about a `Group`.

props.name: as
props.description: The level of the heading and it is only required (enforce by runtime warning) for lists. (i.e. not required for ActionMenu or listbox roles)

props.name: title
props.description: Please use `ActionList.GroupHeading` instead.

props.name: auxiliaryText
props.description: Secondary text that provides additional information about the group.

props.name: variant
props.description: `inline` descriptions are positioned beside primary text. `block` descriptions are positioned below primary text.

props.name: selectionVariant
props.description: Set `selectionVariant` at the group level.

props.name: role
props.description: ARIA role describing the function of the list inside the group. `listbox` and `menu` are a common values.
